description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically in this cluster, the tags deal with the management of communicating information security related information or the transmission of information protected under the organizational information security policy.
name: COMM-MGMT

values.description: Networks are managed and controlled to protect information in systems and applications.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 09.a Network Controls
